frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-workspace-indicator
frozen.shortDescription: Workspace indicator shows the amount of opened workspaces and highlights the current one using unicode characters.
frozen.longDescription:
Workspace indicator shows the amount of opened workspaces and highlights the current one using unicode characters.

You can use it as an indicator only but widget is clickable. Left button click: move to left, right click: move right.

Pay attention:
1) there could be an error with the extension after install or update. The solution is to logout and login again.
2) there could be an error if you have another extension with the same name "workspace indicator" already installed. The solution is to remove the old one.
